results.title: Harvie Krumpet
results.creator_credit: Adam Elliot, Melanie Coombs, SBS Independent, Film Victoria, Australian Film Commission and Melodrama Pictures
results.brief_description:
Adam Elliot’s bittersweet claymation short work opens in Poland in 1922 with the birth of Harvek Milos Krumpetzki - an innocent child beguiled with the world, born to doting and quite dotty parents.

Despite being mercilessly teased as a child, Harvek maintains interest in his surrounds, encouraged by his mother who assists him in collecting wonderful ‘fakts’ about the world. One night Harvek’s life is irrevocably altered when WWII breaks out and he migrates to a faraway land - Australia. In an attempt to assimilate Harvek changes his name to Harvie Krumpet and, in the suburb of Spotswood, begins a new life involving marriage, parenthood and finally, old age.

Winner of the 2003 Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film, and narrated by Geoffrey Rush.

results.title: Harum scarum
results.creator_credit: Gene Nelson, Sam Katzman and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: The King’s 19th movie is shot on the original 1925 Cecil B DeMille set from “King of Kings” and features Elvis as matinee idol Johnny Tyrone. When Tyrone is kidnapped en route to the Middle Eastern premier of his latest film, he is launched into an Arabian Nights scenario, complete with chicks, sheikhs, a hostile political environment, and the obligatory damsel in distress (Mary Ann Mobley). He is also asked to take part in a plot to assassinate an Arab king. Features nine songs including “Harem holiday”, “Golden coins”, “Shake that tambourine” and “Go East young man”. Cast also includes Fran Jeffries, Michael Ansara and Jay Novello. The film is alleged to have been made within 18 days.

results.title: Lucky 13 = Xianu shisan mei
results.creator_credit: Shao Yangzhen, Toru Muragawa, Yang Qitian, Tsuji Optical Laboratories and Beijing Film Studio
results.brief_description:
This is a revenge story taking place in the Qing Dynasty. Miss He Yufeng’s father is a junior officer who offended Minister Ji Xiantang for refusing Ji’s son’s proposal to marry his daughter, Yufeng. Yufeng’s parents were killed by Ji but she narrowly escaped. Yufeng learns kung-fu from a kung-fu master and swears to revenge. After years of practice, Yufeng becomes a kung-fu master and plans to assassinate the Minister. Before she leaves, Yufeng’s master gave her a name, Lucky 13 (or: Sister 13) as ‘Yu’ consists of ‘ten’ and ‘three’. Yufeng’s assassination attempt failed and Minister Ji also hired a kung-fu master, Iron Monk, to protect him. In the meantime, Yufeng met a young and handsome scholar, Mr. An. Yufeng fell in love with An and risked her life to save An, who was robbed by bandits. Yufeng disguised herself as a dancer and killed Minister Ji finally. At the end of the film, Yufeng leaves her swear brothers, who helped her to revenge, and goes to find Mr. An. This is an interesting film that defies the stereotypical image of traditional Chinese women who are normally portrayed as subordinates of men.

The story of Lucky 13 is popular in Hong Kong, Taiwan and China and has different film and TV versions. For example, the Hong Kong TVB produced a 20 episodes TV series of Lucky 13 in 1983. The heroine of the film, DING Lan is a very well-known actress in China. She starred in The Shaolin Temple (1982) with Jet Li and played a couple of leading roles in other martial arts films as well. (3 stars - Yuxing Zhou; May 21, 2010)

results.title: Van Gogh (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Alain Resnais, Pierre Braunberger, Robert Hessens, Gaston Diehl and Films du Pantheon
results.brief_description: The life story of Vincent Van Gogh presented through the medium of his paintings. Mentions his early years as a preacher among miners in the Borinage, his resolution to abandon preaching in favour of painting, the period in Paris when he won the respect and admiration of artists, the flight to Province and finally his madness and eventual death. Mentions the chief influences on the development of Van Gogh’s distinctive technique. Narrated by Jim Barrett.

results.title: Freaky Friday
results.creator_credit: Gary Nelson, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: A young Jodie Foster stars as Annabel Andrews, a precocious 13 year old who experiences a Friday unlike any other. Annabel and her mother simultaneously switch identities. While Annabel’s mother struggles through her daughter’s typing exam, band practice and unusual eating habits, Annabel is faced with running the household and looking after her younger brother. Both discover the other’s life is not as easy as they first imagined and things change for the better when they regain their own identities. Based on the book by Mary Rodgers. Cast includes Barbara Harris, John Astin, Patsy kelly, Dick Van patten, Vicki Schreck.

results.title: The Lost tribe
results.creator_credit: John Laing, Gary Hannam, New Zealand Film Commission and Meridian Films
results.brief_description: In this suspense thriller, a missing anthropologist is given up for lost by his wife (Darien Takle) and twin brother Edward (John Bach), but his daughter (Emma Takle) is convinced something odd is involved in her father’s disappearance. Events conspire to put the three people together on a manhunt for the anthropologist amongst a “lost” tribe in the dense jungle of the southern island of New Zealand.

results.title: The Postman = Il Postino
results.creator_credit: Michael Radford, Gaetano Daniele, Vittorio Cecchi Gori, Mario Cecchi Gori, Miramax Films, Tiger Cinematografica and Cecchi Gori Group
results.brief_description: Mario (Massimoi Troisi), works as a postman on a small Italian island to only one customer - the poet Pablo Neruda (Phillippe Noiret). Hiding on the island to avoid political problems in his native Chile, Neruda receives bags of fan mail daily from women all over the world. Mario is a wanna-be poet and a helpless romantic who has no luck with attracting women, and sees Neruda as the solution to all his problems. Unfortunately seeking help is not easy, as Neruda is unfriendly and aloof, but eventually they become friends, and with help Mario is able to become the poet he wants to be, and win the heart of the woman he loves. Oscar nominated for Best Picture in 1995. In Italian with English subtitles

results.title: Homeward bound
results.creator_credit: Duwayne Dunham, Richard Prince, Franklin R. Levy, Jeffrey Chernov and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Family oriented children’s themed adventure comedy, about three domestic pets making their way across rugged country, back to their beloved owners. Their many misadventures embrace the themes of friendship, co-operation and familial love. Cast and voice cast includes Robert Hays, Kim Greist, Jean Smart, Michael J. Fox, Benji Thall, Veronica Lauren, Don Ameche and Sally Field.

results.title: Hunting
results.brief_description: The power of seduction is explored in this dramatic thriller where corruption is rife in the business and political world. Media tycoon Michael Bergman (John Savage) meets a married executive secretary (Kerry Armstrong) and the two begin an affair. She, seduced by promises and material wealth, falls for Michael and moves into his mansion and life for good. Once part of his domain, however, like a moth to the flame (a literal image in the film) her new world starts to unravel. Written, directed and produced by Frank Howson. Cast includes Guy Pearce, Rebecca Rigg, Jeffrey Thomas, Rhys McConnochie, Nicholas Bell.

results.title: The Waterboy
results.creator_credit: Frank Coraci, Jack Giarraputo, Robert Simonds and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: In this comedic film of sight gags Adam Sandler plays the role of Bobby Boucher, a water boy for the local college football team. Bobby cops it from all directions - his over-bearing mother (Kathy Bates), the football team and even the coach (Jerry Reed). When the coach fires him, Bobby is forced to join the rival team under Coach Klein (Henry Winkler) where he turns his talents from water boy to a star tackler setting this losing team on the road to victory. Love, glory and revenge await Bobby as he takes up his new life as a football hero and college student. Cast includes Fairuza Balk, Blake Clark and Larry Gilliard Jr.
